reviewText: I am sure that this is an accurate picture of life under Japanese occupation for the South Koreans.  But the title and the cover photo made me think it would be something else.  Was looking for the eye candy of the era, the gorgeous clothing, great cars & architectureVERY sad serious business.  I should have realized it from the cast.  Disappointed, but then I was not reading the signals right.  If you are looking for something griping, this is probably your cup of tea.
I thought this was a well written and acted movie. The charecters were right on; for that time period.
